title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.14 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.14 - Applicability

State Regulations

The requirements of this Subpart shall: (a) Apply within a county health district, a part-county health district, and a city having a city health department, when adopted by the appropriate local authority. (b) Apply in those State district health areas designated by the State Commissioner of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-2.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
